Headline: Temporary Northbound #53 Pulaski Reroute near Pulaski/Division
ShortDescription: Northbound 53 Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted near Pulaski/Division.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #53 Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted via Pulaski, Division, Kostner, Grand, Pulaski, and resume normal route, due to street blockage near Pulaski/Division.

Allow extra travel time.
